title: CommonVideoPlayer PRO
description: CommonVideoPlayer Pro is a professional video player widget implementation of CommonVideoPlayer and CommonUI to look similar to YouTube, VLC, Windows Media Player and to play mp4 files out of the box with some limitations*
longDescription:
CommonVideoPlayer Pro is a professional video player widget implementation of my free plugin CommonVideoPlayerExposedBP to play mp4 files out of the box with some limitations* for the moment that the upcoming UE5.5 may patch/remove. This is developed on top of CommonVideoPlayer and CommonUI.


50% OFF LAUNCH DISCOUNT FOR A LIMITED TIME


SHOWCASE VIDEO => Link

PLAY THE DEMO => Link

REQUIREMENT: Before running the project, you need to install my free plugin CommonVideoPlayerExposedBP


What makes this different from the free version in the CommonVideoPlayerExposedBP plugin ?

CommonVideoPlayer Pro has been implemented to look like a pro VideoPlayer similar to YouTube, VLC, Windows Media Player…


CommonVideoPlayer Pro is also optimized, as the progress bar progression is handled by the timeline component against “Event tick” used in the free CommonVideoPlayerExposedBP plugin videoPlayer widget example.


Features:

  • Play/Pause feature both on the video player screen (when hovering the mouse cursor over the video player screen) and the play/stop icon on the bottom-left corner; 
  • Video progress bar 
  • Seek: Click feature => click anywhere on the progress bar or slider bar to play the video at different timeline
  • Seek: Slider feature => drag and drop the slider to move the video to any timeline position you want it to play
  • Auto Play: play the video immediately when opening the video player or you can disable it so that the user has to click on the play button to start playing the video
  • Show Video Title on Start ? => decide whether you want to show or hide the video title when the video start playing like in the popular video player softwares 
  • Video Title: provide a title for the video (Optional !)
  • Use Video Preview Image? : decide whether you want to show a preview image on videoPlayer screen before the user click on “Play” button
  • Video Preview Image: provide a preview image to display on the video player screen before the user click on “Play” button
  • Easy to use, to skin and customize
  • Optimized
technicalDetails:
Number of Blueprints: 4 ( 2 widgets BP, 1 BP class and 1 BP interface)

Input: Keyboard, Mouse

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Documentation: PlayList

Important/Additional Notes:


DISCLAIMER: CommonUI and UE CommonVideoPlayer are still in beta version, that means you may face some issues that are not related to this asset but UE. If you faces issues while playing video, try to bring down the video quality below 2k as that results to work well through all the tests I did so far, so better for production phase.

REQUIREMENT: Before running the project, you need to install my free plugin CommonVideoPlayerExposedBP

*LIMITATION 1: 4K videos are not supported yet when testing.

*LIMITATION 2: The video audio is only supported on a standalone project not in the editor or PIE yet when testing.
